mapper.insert: insert into recordinfo(chatRecord, fileName, recordMd5, recordTime, appFlag) values ( #{chatRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate(), #{appFlag} )
mapper.select: select count(1) from recordinfo where recordMd5= #{recordMd5 } and appFlag = #{appFlag}
select * from recordinfo where appFlag=#{appFlag} and recordClassId = '-1'
